utterance: Doug Shepherd, Arizona State University: So we've done this with snapshot RNA fish data. So the problem with RNA fish data is you have to kill the sample. So it turns out you can actually link the snapshot data using some modeling ideas. So these come more from control theory, so they're things like chemical master equation and these other things.
